pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bland-Altman Method Comparison // Carries out Bland Altman analyses (also known as a Tukey mean-difference plot) as described by JM Bland and DG Altman in 1986 doi:10.1016/S0140-6736(86)90837-8. This package was created in 2015 as existing Bland-Altman analysis functions did not calculate confidence intervals. This package was created to rectify this, and create reproducible plots.
